greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Decimal expansion of exp(Pi^2/12).
formula: exp(Pi^2/12) = Product_{n>=1} Product_{k=1..n+1} k^(1/(n+1)) * H(n) * (-1)^k * binomial(n, k-1) where H(n) is the n-th harmonic number.
exp(Pi^2/12) = lim_{n -> infinity} Product_{k=1..n} (1 + k/n)^(1/k). - _Peter Bala_, Feb 14 2015
results.author: _John M. Campbell_, Jul 30 2011
